metadata.title: eileen.codes
metadata.description:
About

Hi, I'm Eileen! I'm a Senior Staff Production Engineer at Shopify where I work on making Rails and Ruby more scalable, more performant, and more secure. I'm an avid contributor to Open Source and have been a member of the Rails Core team since 2017. I enjoy speaking at conferences, usually about performance or contributing to Open Source. Other than writing code, I enjoy craft beer and hiking with my husband, Abe and our dog, Arya.
